EmoQ: Well, we can burn some sage, and light some candles, and then we can go around the circle and say what we want to let go of.
history:
***history***
Rachel Green: (Neutral) Ok, ok, Roger was creepy, but he was nothing compared to Pete Carney.
Monica Geller: (Neutral) Which one was Pete Carney?
Rachel Green: (Mad) Pete the Weeper? Remember that guy who used to cry every time we had sex. "Was it good for you?"
Monica Geller: (Mad) Yeah, well, I'll take a little crying any day over Howard-the-"I-win"-guy. "I win! I win!" I went out with the guy for two monthsI didn't get to win once.
Rachel Green: (Mad) How did we end up with these jerks? We're good people!
Monica Geller: (Neutral) I don't know. Maybe we're some kinda magnets.
Phoebe Buffay: (Neutral) I know I am. That's why I can't wear a digital watch.
Monica Geller: (Neutral) There's more beer, right?
Phoebe Buffay: (Neutral) Oh! You know my friend Abby who shaves her head? She said that if you want to break the bad boyfriend cycle, you can do like a cleansing ritual.
Rachel Green: (Neutral) Pheebes, this woman is voluntarily bald.
Phoebe Buffay: (Joyful) Yeah. So, we can do it tomorrow night, you guys. It's Valentine's Day. It's perfect.
Monica Geller: (Neutral) Ok, well, what kind of ritual?
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as Phoebe Buffay, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {Mad,Neutral,Joyful,Scared,Sad,Powerful,Peaceful} to respond to the Monica Geller
SourceData: Ok. We can, um, we can burn the stuff they gave us.
Coct: Oh, I'm so glad you guys are on board with this! I was thinking we could do a little smudging ceremony, light some candles, and just let go of all the negative energy from our past relationships. It'll be really empowering, I promise!
FSM: Well, you have to burn all your old stuff.
